#| label: setup-r

# R-side setup
library(reticulate)

# Choose a project-specific virtualenv (works on macOS/Linux/Windows with Python installed)
venv <- "r-frengression"
if (!virtualenv_exists(venv)) {
  virtualenv_create(venv)
}
use_virtualenv(venv, required = TRUE)

# Helpful: print Python config
py_config()
